entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning and late in the afternoon. Risk of thundershowers late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 28. Humidex 34. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: Showers ending in the evening then clearing. Risk of thundershowers early in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 10 September 2016
